info.name: Firefox Windows - Tab bar buttons as tabs
info.description:
For Firefox 4 or later

This makes the buttons positioned in the tab bar look like tabs.

You can configure which tabs' appearance is modified. (Hint : apply the style several times with different parameters if you want a particular set of buttons.)

This is the Windows version.
Linux version here : style 60170

To customize or fix Firefox, you can also have a look at my other styles : http://userstyles.org/styles/browse/all/Firefox%20lOtR
info.additionalInfo:
Updates :
